name: Gang War Mafiya Misson
description:
Grab The Auto Gang War mafiya

Get ready for fun, immersive, and wild gang wars !!!

A real gangster from notorious crime gang is starting a gang vendetta in the dark streets of city. Get ready to build underworld criminal empire and pose a threat to civilians in the most amazing Crime City game.

It is Combination of fighting, running,Shooting,sniper shooting, racing, action, adventure, terrorist game, Car stunt, Flying games.

Performance Extra Ordinary levels with difficult challenges in this action fighting games. if you are real gamer then achieve more money through playing.

Are your ready for great criminal adventure? Be ready to rob, kill, shoot and fight!

Complete activity missions and build up your own lawbreaker empire to become the godfather of mafia!

How to Play :

- Use Driving controls in driver mode  with luxury cars. 
- Use the joystick to move your character  
- Use Sprint button to run
  - Use aim and shoot button in shooting mode and left and right side arrow button change the gun.

Key Features:

=> Unique Mission assassins.  => Amazing 3D graphics
=> Amazing township environment
=> Explore the open world gangstar empire
=> Real life weapons and gangster cars
